name: California Design Den Natural 100% Cotton Sheets Queen Size Bed Set - Soft 400 Thread Count Sateen, Queen Sheets, Deep Pockets with All Around Elastic for a Snug Fit, Cool & Durable Bedding - White
short_description: WINNER GOOD HOUSEKEEPING 2023 BEST BEDDING AWARD!: Wake up refreshed in all seasons with our certified 400-thread count soft, cool & comfortable 100 percent cotton queen white sheets, crafted in a soft sateen weave. As featured in a 2023 Wall Street Journal article, our queen sheet set was referred to as "as soft as sheets 3x the price" - a great value indeed. Experience ultimate comfort with these luxury queen sheets. PERFECTLY SIZED BED SHEET SET WITH DEEP POCKET: Our 4-piece bedding sheets & pillowcases set includes 1 top sheet, 1 deep pocket fitted sheet with an all-around elastic that fits mattresses 8 to 16 inches deep, and 2 standard/queen size pillowcases that fits both standard and queen pillows. The high-quality elastic of this cotton queen sheet set won't loosen or bunch up, and headside/footside indicators make bed-making a breeze DURABLE, COLORFAST & EASY CARE: You can machine wash and dry our white bed sheets queen size at a normal setting, and they will come out looking great for years. Our deep pocket cooling sheets are durable, with no linting, wrinkle resistant, and no pilling. These queen bed sheets also do not fade or shrink. HEALTH BENEFITS: Cotton is naturally breathable and gentle on your skin. According to the National Sleep Foundation, synthetic fabrics like microfiber can disrupt sleep and cause health issues, while 100% cotton sheets promote natural temperature regulation and better daytime functioning. Our bedding sheets & pillowcases are certified OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100, tested for harmful substances to protect your health. OUR COMMITMENT: We prioritize comfort, community, and sustainability. Since 2022, we've donated over 36,000 bedding items to US charities and removed plastic from our packaging. Sheets are crafted in our family‑owned factory in India with care and quality‑checked—thread count may vary by ±5% due to standard manufacturing limits. Enjoy affordable luxury and hassle‑free returns for a better night’s sleep.

name: Bedsure Floral White Quilt Set - Queen Size Reversible Quilt Bedding Set, 3 Pieces Lightweight Bedspread, Soft Botanical Bed Coverlet with 2 Pillow Shams for All Seasons (90"x96")
short_description: 100% Polyester Softness That Lasts: This quilt set features an advanced quilting craftsmanship on brushed microfiber for superior softness, and gets even softer after washes. The heavier-than-average microfiber filling covered in the 85 GSM brushed polyester shell gives this quilt the right amount of weight. This warm yet lightweight quilt set is suitable for hot summer eves and delivers essential supplementary warmth during cold winter days. Elevated Classic Texture: This floral quilt set adds personality to your sleep haven with colorful styles and vivid patterns, energizing you for the day ahead and helping you unwind with recharging nights of sleep. Versatile and Practical: This quilt set is versatilely practical for various use cases, including as a thin summer quilt, as an extra lightweight bedspread in the winter, as a bed coverlet for pet, or as a simple and elegant bedding decoration element. Enhanced Durability: This premium quality quilt set is machine washable, featuring neat stitching construction that ensures a stronger connection at the seams and prevents the filling from shifting. The unique dyeing technique brings out the colors and prevents them from fading. What You Can Get: This Standard 100 by OEKO-TEX certified Bedsure queen quilt bedding set comes with 1 quilt (90" x 96") and 2 pillow shams (20" x 26" + 2").
